hero_title: Shin kana da matukar sha'awar gasar Olympic?
hero_subtitle: Ka yi wannan kacici-kacicin domin ganin ko za ka iya samun kyautar zinare.
question_1_question: Kana shakku ko kana da yaƙini?
question_1_feedback: Ra'ayoyin ƙwararru: Idan kana yin aiki cikin nutsuwa sannan ka mayar da hankali a kan fannoni daban-daban na rayuwa, ciki har da wasanni, mai yiwuwa za ka yi nasara. Idan baka yi haka ba, ba za ka yi nasara ba.
question_2_question: Yin hobbasa kashi 110 ko samun tubus-tubus
question_2_high: Yin bakin kokarinka a wani lokaci
question_2_low: Ina son yin abin da ya fi sauki
question_2_lowest: Yin abin da ya fi sauki kowanne lokaci
question_2_feedback: Ra'ayoyin ƙwararru: Neman abu mafi girma yana taimaka wa dan wasan motsa jiki, amma yana da muhimmanci ya nemi abin da zai iya cimmawa, kuma kada ya takura wa kansa.
question_3_question: A yi gaba, a yi baya idan al'amura suka rincabe
question_3_feedback: Ra'ayoyin ƙwararru: Kana dab da fara kacici-kacicin mil 100 kuma miliyoyin mutane ne ke kallon duk abin da kake yi -- Za ka iya yi kuwa? Ana yin zarra ne idan matsi ya yi matsi.
question_4_question: Shin kai tauraron mawaka ne ko kuwa mutum ne da ke jin kunya a wurin taro?
question_4_low: Ina dan jin kunya a wurin taro
question_4_lowest: Ina jin kunya sosai a wurin taron jama'a
question_4_feedback: Sharhin kwararru: Duk da cewa ba dabi'a ce mai kyau ba, amma masu alfahari sun fi zama 'yan wasan tseren da suka fi sa'a. Amma ba kowa ne dan tsere ne ke samun hakan ba, ku tuna cewa mutane basa son dagawa.
question_5_question: Za ka fara fafatawa ko kuma za ka janye?
question_5_low: Zan fafata ne kawai idan ya zama wajibi
question_5_feedback: Sharhin kwararru: Ba zaka zama zakaran wasan Olympic ba har sai in kana son yin gasa da mutane kana kuma samun nasara a kansu. Son yin gasa zai taimaka wajen fiddo da kwarewarka a wasanni.
question_6_question: Za ka fara abin da ke gabanka ne ko sai ka jira an gaya maka?
question_6_highest: Ni ina farawa ne kawai ba jira! To don me zan jira?
question_6_low: Na kan jira sai an gayyace ni
question_6_lowest: Bana taba fara abu da kaina
question_6_feedback: Sharhin ƙwararru: Abu mai kyau bai taba zuwa wajen masu jira ba. Yi amfani da damarka don kai wa gaci idan kana son yin nasara.
question_7_question: Kana yin abubuwa ne don soyayyar da ka ke wa wasanni ko don abin duniya?
question_7_lowest: Samun abin duniya ne kawai yake karfafa min gwiwa
question_7_low: Samun abin duniya ne babban abin da ke karfafa min gwiwa
question_7_high: Zan ce ina kauna fiye da ina so
question_7_highest: Saboda son da nake wa wasan
question_7_feedback: Sharhin ƙwararru: Shin ka karu da abin da ka yi? Yawanci ana tallata irin hakan ne saboda wasu dalilai -- samun abin da zai tunzura mutum na cikin abubuwan da za su sa shi ya yi nasara.
question_8_question: Tudun-mun-tsira ko wajen da ke cike da hadari?
question_8_highest: Daidai wajen da ke cike da hadari
question_8_high: Ina so na yi iya yi na domin kaiwa gaci
question_8_low: Ina farin ciki a wajen tudun-mun-tsirana
question_8_feedback: Sharhin ƙwararru: Babban abokin hamayyarka yana kusa. Idan ka mayar da hankali wajen inganta yadda kake yin wannan gasa za ka iya yin nasara.
question_9_question: Ka yarda da kanka ko kana shakka?
question_9_lowest: Ban taba yarda da kaina ba
question_9_highest: Na yarda da kaina sosai ba haufi
question_9_feedback: Sharhin kwararru: Yarda da kai na da muhimmanci a samun nasara a wasanni - tambayi Usain Bolta ka sha labari... Amma fa yana iya sauyawa, ya danganta da yanayi, don haka ko Usain ya kan samu sauyi a yarda da kansa da ya yi.
question_10_low: Mutumin da ba shi da tabbas
question_10_high: Da wuya wani abu ya dauke min hankali
question_10_feedback: Sharhin kwararru: Har yanzu kana tare da mu? Shin ka yi nasara ba tare da an dauke ma hankali ba? Kwakwalwa na iya mayar da hankali ne kan abubuwa kadan a lokaci guda, don haka mayar da hankali kan abin da ya fi dacewa na da muhimmanci.
question_11_question: Yi kai kadai ko neman taimako?
question_11_highest: Ina yi ni kadai. Zan iya yi da kaina
question_11_high: Ina yi ni kadai, mafi yawancin lokuta
question_11_low: Na kan nemi taimako a wasu lokutan
question_11_lowest: Ina neman taimako a duk sanda bukatar hakan ta taso
question_11_feedback: Sharhin kwararru: Ba wanda zai iya komai shi kadai. Kana bukatar taimako? Tambayi abokan aikinka, 'yan uwa, abokai, 'yan tawagarku ko koci - duk za su iya taimaka maka wajen ci gaban yadda ka ke abubuwa.
question_12_question: Samun abin da ka ke so ko fatan samun wanda ya fi?
question_12_high: Ina son samun abin da nake so
question_12_highest: Kwarai, samun abin da nake so shi ne burina
question_12_feedback: Sharhin kwararu: Idan ka samu biyan bukata, za ka kara samun yarda da kanka a abin da ka ke yi, kuma kafin ka farga, za ka cimma abubuwa da yawa fiye da tunaninka.
question_14_question: Ya ya yanayin kazar-kazar dinka yake?
results_category_1_text: Kana da tunanin da ake bukata don kalubalantar wani abu a matakin karshe na gasar wasanni. Shekara hudu ake dauka kafin wata gasar Olympics din - kana bukatar samun horo!
results_category_2_text: Kana da dukkan abin da ake bukata don zama dan tsere na kwarai, amma dole sai ka yi aiki tukuru kafin ka zarta Usain Bolt da sauran su don yin nasara.
results_category_3_text: Kamar dai baka da abin da ake bukata don zama dan wasan tsere, amma za ka zamo babbar kadara ga kungiyoyin wasnni na cikin gida. Ka kara kwazo idan kana son ci gaba.
results_category_4_text: Baka da abin da ake bukata don yin gasa a wasannin Olympic, amma duk da haka za ka iya yin wasa a karamin mataki. Lokacin gudu ya yi?
results_category_5_text: Ba abin mamaki ba ne don baka da abin da ake bukata ga dan wasan Olympic, amma duk da haka za ka iya yin wasanni da motsa jiki don ka samu kuzari.
strengths_text: Inda ka fi kwazo su ne
weakness_text: Amma za ka iya kara kwazo ta wajen
activity_1_text: Karanta karin bayani kan yadda za ka shiga wasanni a
activity_2_text: Karanta karin bayani kan yadda za ka fara wasanni da motsa jiki a
share_result_1: Ina da azama irin ta dan wasan Olympic
share_result_2: Ina da azama irin ta dan tsere
share_result_3: Ina da azama irin ta mai son motsa jiki
share_result_4: Ina da azama irin ta mai motsa jiki a karshen mako
share_result_5: Ina da azama irin ta mutum maras tabbas
share_outro_text: Ka duba ka ga abubuwan da ake bukata idan kana son shiga gasar #Rio2016.
credits_external_sites_message: BBC ba ta da alhakin wasu abubuwan da shafukan intanet daban suke dauke da shi
method_text: An yi wannan kacici-kacici ne tare da hadin gwiwar Dr David Fletcher, wani masanin halayyar dan adam ta fuskar wasanni da ke Jami'ar Loughborough. An tsara tambayoyin ne domin fito da irin dabi'un da ke da matukar muhimmanci wajen cimma nasara a harkar wasanni.
